start.text: Hello! Nice to  meet you! It's a [wave]mess[/wave] around here.

options.text: I know, I will help sort it out

question.text: I'm... not really sure, but there are a lot of things out of place...

start-again.text: Will you help us put things back to where they go?

options.text: (Hmm... Maybe that's how I can get out of here...) I will do my best!
I don't know where to start

works.text: Thanks! But try to be quick... This world feels, [wave]unstable...[/wave]. I'm not sure how long it can last.

does-not-work.text: Look around! There's plenty to explore. My great grand neuron once walked through one of these holes between the trees. We never saw him back.
